mapper.sql: flID, fromUserID, fromUserNickName, fromAvatarUrl, toUserID, toUserNickName, toAvatarUrl, replyComment, createAt
mapper.select: SELECT ID, FROM SecondLevelComment WHERE flID=#{flID} ORDER BY ID DESC /*Limit 0, 3*/;
SELECT ID, FROM SecondLevelComment WHERE flID=#{flID} ORDER BY ID DESC Limit #{offset}, #{pageSize};
SELECT ID, FROM SecondLevelComment WHERE ID = #{ID};

select SL.ID ID, SL.fromUserID fromUserID, SL.fromUserNickName fromUserNickName, SL.fromAvatarUrl fromAvatarUrl, SL.replyComment replyComment, FL.newsID newsID, FL.Subject Subject, FL.count count from SecondLevelComment SL inner join FirstLevelComment FL on SL.flID = FL.ID where SL.toUserID = #{toUserID} and SL.toUserID != SL.fromUserID order by ID desc Limit #{offset}, #{pageSize};
